page.title: 04BROADSTAIRS AS A SEA RESORT
page.content: We asked{residents}and{visitors}what they liked and disliked about Broadstairs. Most{residents}enjoy the beautiful coastline and harbour.They{like}the "olde worlde" atmosphere and are glad it's not too commercial.They feel it's a peaceful,relaxing town with a slow pace of living.It has arcades for the young and deckchairs for the elderly. Most{visitors}enjoy the summer sun,sea and sandy beaches.They think it's quiet with nice pubs,restaurants and clean beaches. {Dislikes}include:-too many estate agents and building societies;dirty sea water;too windy;fouling of paths by dogs;pavements too narrow. Many thought it didn't cater for young people with no discos,nightlife or fashion shops.Some of the older visitors wanted slopes and not steps.
